column1: that the Plaintiff is entitled to pre-empt the share sold by the 2nd Defendant, on Deed No. 4721
dated 21-07-1981 to the 3rd and 4th Defendants and to declare the said Deed as null and void.
rejected the said contention and moved for dismissal of the Plaint.

column2: The  District  Court  dismissed  the  case  of  the  Plaintiff  with  costs.  The  Plaintiff  went

column1: before the High Court and the High Court too, dismissed the Plaintiff’s appeal.

column2: Being aggrieved by the said decision the Plaintiff came before this Court. The Court

column1: granted leave to appeal on four Questions of Law raised by the Plaintiff. The fifth question
was raised on behalf of the Defendants.
